languages.text: "Милый аперитив, но по сравнению с аренами Комморры их страдания безвкусны. Я мог бы преподать твоим палачам пару занимательных уроков".
"This is a charming appetiser to be sure, but compared to the arenas of Commorragh, their suffering is quite flavourless. I could give your torturers a few riveting lessons, if you like."
languages.original_text: "Милый аперитив, но по сравнению с аренами Комморры их страдания безвкусны. Я мог бы преподать твоим палачам пару занимательных уроков".

"This is a charming appetiser to be sure, but compared to the arenas of Commorragh, their suffering is quite flavourless. I could give your torturers a few riveting lessons, if you like."

languages.text: "Ein reizender Appetitanreger, gewiss, doch im Vergleich zu den Arenen von Commorragh ist ihr Lied recht öde und fad. Ich könnte Euren Folterknechten einige fesselnde Unterichtsstunden geben."
languages.original_text: "This is a charming appetiser to be sure, but compared to the arenas of Commorragh, their suffering is quite flavourless. I could give your torturers a few riveting lessons, if you like."

traits.locale_text: "Ein reizender Appetitanreger, gewiss, doch im Vergleich zu den Arenen von Commorragh ist ihr Lied recht öde und fad. Ich könnte Euren Folterknechten einige fesselnde Unterichtsstunden geben."

languages.text: « Une entrée en matière des plus appétissantes, certes, mais leur souffrance est par trop insipide, comparée aux arènes de Commorragh. Si tel est votre désir, je pourrais donner à vos tortionnaires quelques leçons particulièrement édifiantes. »
languages.original_text: "This is a charming appetiser to be sure, but compared to the arenas of Commorragh, their suffering is quite flavourless. I could give your torturers a few riveting lessons, if you like."

traits.locale_text: « Une entrée en matière des plus appétissantes, certes, mais leur souffrance est par trop insipide, comparée aux arènes de Comorragh. Si tel est votre désir, je pourrais donner à vos tortionnaires quelques leçons particulièrement édifiantes. »

languages.text: «Es un aperitivo encantador, pero en comparación con las arenas de Commorragh su sufrimiento resulta insípido. Si quieres, podría proporcionar a vuestros torturadores unas cuantas lecciones».
languages.original_text: "This is a charming appetiser to be sure, but compared to the arenas of Commorragh, their suffering is quite flavourless. I could give your torturers a few riveting lessons, if you like."

traits.locale_text: «Es un aperitivo encantador, pero en comparación con las arenas de Commorragh su sufrimiento resulta insípido. Si quieres, podría proporcionar a vuestros torturadores unas cuantas lecciones».

languages.text: 「これは確かに魅力的な前菜だが、コモラフの闘技場に比べたら、彼らの苦しみはまったく味気ない。お望みなら、拷問者たちに面白いレッスンを与えよう」
languages.original_text: "This is a charming appetiser to be sure, but compared to the arenas of Commorragh, their suffering is quite flavourless. I could give your torturers a few riveting lessons, if you like."

traits.locale_text: 「これは確かに魅力的な前菜だが、コモラフの闘技場に比べたら、彼らの苦しみはまったく味気ない。お望みなら、拷問者たちに面白いレッスンを与えよう」

languages.text: “这确实是一道迷人的前菜，但和科摩罗的竞技场相比，这里的痛苦实在是食之无味。如果你愿意的话，我可以给你的手下上几堂有趣的课。”
languages.original_text: "This is a charming appetiser to be sure, but compared to the arenas of Commorragh, their suffering is quite flavourless. I could give your torturers a few riveting lessons, if you like."

traits.locale_text: “这确实是一道迷人的前菜，但和科摩罗的竞技场相比，这里的痛苦实在是食之无味。如果你愿意的话，我可以给你的手下上几堂有趣的课。”

languages.original_text: "This is a charming appetiser to be sure, but compared to the arenas of Commorragh, their suffering is quite flavourless. I could give your torturers a few riveting lessons, if you like."

languages.text: "Ağız sulandıran bir aperitif olduğuna kuşku yok. Fakat Commorragh'ın arenalarına kıyasla çektikleri acının pek tadı tuzu yok. İstersen işkencecilerine ilgilerini çekecek birkaç ders verebilirim."
languages.original_text: "This is a charming appetiser to be sure, but compared to the arenas of Commorragh, their suffering is quite flavourless. I could give your torturers a few riveting lessons, if you like."
